title: Dial Pad tone volume
content:
Anyway to lower the dial pad tone? I have the off/ on  toggle but otherwise, I don't know which, if any of the volume controls might  lower the dial pad sound without lowering something  else. 

FYI -

•  Ring Volume is set full loud because of my work setting.

• Call volume - is that for talking and hearing while on phone calls?

• Media volume - I assume (but don't use) for web audios.

Thanks.
